titleStmt.title: Men and brethren, it's like the most part of you come here to gaze and wonder ...
titleStmt.author: Stewart, A.

notesStmt.note: Title from first line of text.
Imprint from colophon. Place of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: faded, with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
